name: apps.datastore.get
desc: Get an item from a datastore

errors.invalid_arguments: The request is missing required arguments.
errors.invalid_auth: Not authorized to get datastore items.
errors.app_not_hosted: The app developer is not using a Slack-hosted environment. App datastores are exclusively available for Slack-hosted apps.
errors.access_denied: Not authorized to access to the datastore.
errors.invalid_app_id: The app_id provided is not valid for team and user.
errors.free_team_not_allowed: Datastore get not allowed on a free team.
errors.team_quota_exceeded: Total number of requests exceeded team quota.
errors.datastore_migration_in_progress: The datastore is currently unavailable due to an in progress Enterprise org migration.
errors.restricted_plan_level: Feature is not available on this team
